title: Program to Improve Intermediate EFL Learners' English Speaking Skills in Scientific Fields Through Modified Role-Play

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Job seekers and graduate students requiring enhanced practical English communication skills in the science field.

learning_goals: Learners can use intermediate-level English expressions in science-related role-play scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Learners successfully perform natural conversational flows (3+ turns) at least three times in 5-minute science-themed role-plays.
Learners achieve an average fluency score of 3 or higher on a 4-point scale (1â€“4) during peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
